title: How to Chill a Glass
description:
Here at the OXO office, we thought you'd like to get tips on how to make delicious and classy cocktails!

Ever wonder how bartenders seem to make your cocktails stay colder for longer than yours do at home? In this OXO Good Tips video, we explain how to easily chill a glass while you're making your cocktail! Stop by
